S06adsp55-u:1170: yat punar bhagavaṃs tathāgateneme dharmā saṃkṣipteṇa ca vistareṇa ca bhāṣitās, (AdSPG I 128)
S06adsp55-u:1171_0: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmenemāḥ
S06adsp55-u:1171_1: ṣaṭpāramitāḥ saṃkṣiptena ca vistareṇa ca paryavāptavyā paryavāpya vācā suparicitāḥ
S06adsp55-u:1172: tathā ca anuprekṣitavyā yathā cittacaitasikadharmā na pravarteran. bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1173: evam etat subhūte evam etat. āsu saṃkṣiptavistareṇa ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo [f. 247b] mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃś ca saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1174: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati?
S06adsp55-u:1176: rūpasya vā vedanāyā vā saṃjñāyā vā saṃskarāṇāṃ vā vijñānasya vā tathatāṃ jānānaḥ. yāvat sarvākārajñatāyās tathatāṃ jānānaḥ. sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1179: yasyā tathatāyā notpādaḥ prajñāyate na vyayaḥ prajñāyate na sthitasyānyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. iyaṃ rūpatathatā yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1180: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ vedanāyā saṃjñāyā saṃskarāṇāṃ vijñānasya tathatā yāvat sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā?
S06adsp55-u:1182_0: yasyā tathatāyā notpāda prajñāyate na vyayaḥ prajñāyate na sthitasyānyathātvan prajñāyate
S06adsp55-u:1182_1: iyaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānatathatā yāvat sarvākārajñatātathatā. yatra bodhisattvena
S06adsp55-u:1182_2: mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ. bhūtakoṭiṃ jānānaḥ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1184: bhagavān āha: akoṭir bhūtakoṭir. atra koṭyāṃ (AdSPG I 129)
S06adsp55-u:1185: śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattva sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
S06adsp55-u:1186: dharmadhātuṃ jānāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1189: yasya dharmadhātor nocchedaḥ prajñāyate na paricchedaḥ. evaṃ caraṃ dharmadhātuṃ jānānan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1192: yathā sarvadharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1193: katame te bhagavaṃ sarvadharmā ye na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1195: rūpaṃ na saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaṃ na saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ yāvat saṃskṛtadhātur asaṃskṛtadhātur na saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1196: na hy asya svabhāvo 'sti yaḥ saṃyujyeta vā visaṃyujyeta vā,
S06adsp55-u:1198_0: yaś ca abhāvaḥ sa abhāvena sārddhaṃ na saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ. evaṃ sarvadharmā
S06adsp55-u:1198_1: jñātavyāḥ. ayaṃ punaḥ suhhūte abhisaṃkṣepo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ. atra hi
S06adsp55-u:1199: yāvad daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthitvā ihaiva abhisaṃkṣepe śikṣitavyaṃ. iha punar abhisaṃkṣepe śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣepavistaraṃ jñāsyati. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1200: tīkṣṇendriyasya bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ayaṃ praveśaḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1201: bhagavān āha: mṛdvendriyasya api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ayaṃ praveśo,
S06adsp55-u:1203_0: api bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ayaṃ praveśaḥ asamāhitendriyasya api bodhisattvasya
S06adsp55-u:1203_1: mahāsattvasya ayaṃ praveśaḥ. na ayaṃ kasyacid yan na praveśaḥ śikṣitukāmasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
S06adsp55-u:1204: na kusīdasya ayaṃ praveśo na hīnavīryasya na muṣitasmṛter na vikṣiptacittasya,
S06adsp55-u:1206_0: śikṣitukāmasya avaivartikabhūmau sarvākārajñatām anuprāptukāmasya ayaṃ praveśaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1206_1: saced yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣiṣyate śikṣitvā dānāpāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1206_3: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati. tasya khalu punar bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1207_0: sa utpadyamānāny eva prahāsyante. tasmād upāyakauśalaṃ parigṛhītukāmena bodhisattvena
S06adsp55-u:1207_1: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattva
S06adsp55-u:1207_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate.
S06adsp55-u:1207_3: tasmiṃ samaye asaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti
S06adsp55-u:1207_4: saddharmaṃ deśayaṃti. te taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti. prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1208_0: ato niryātā hy atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavaṃta. yaduta ṣaṭpāramitebhyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1208_1: tasmāt tarhi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ pratikāṃkṣitavyam
S06adsp55-u:1208_2: aham apy etān dharmān anuprāpsyāmi. ye 'tītānāgatapratyutpannair buddhair bhagavadbhir
S06adsp55-u:1208_3: anuprāptā anuprāpyante. anuprāpsyante ca. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena (AdSPG I 131)
S06adsp55-u:1209_0: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata yogaṃ āpattavyaṃ. evaṃ yujyamāno bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:1209_1: mahāsattva kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. tasmāt tarhi bodhisattvena
S06adsp55-u:1209_2: mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatāmanasikārair avirahitena bhavitavyaṃ. sacet punar bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:1209_3: mahāsattva evaṃ caran sarvākārajñatāyām antaśo 'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātram api prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1209_4: bhāvayiṣyati. sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattva bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:1209_5: na tv eva trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau ye sattvās tān dānena saṃtarpayet śīle
S06adsp55-u:1209_6: pratiṣṭhāpayet samādhau pratiṣṭhāpayet prajñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayed vimuktau pratiṣṭhāpayed
S06adsp55-u:1209_7: vimuktijñānadarśane pratiṣṭhāpayet śrotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed yāvad arhattve
S06adsp55-u:1210: ayam eva bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved ya imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām acchaṭāsaṃghātamātram api bhāvayet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1211_1: yāvad arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhiḥ. ye 'pi te buddhā bhagavanto daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu
S06adsp55-u:1211_2: tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti te 'py ato niryātāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1211_3: ye 'pi te 'tītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantas te 'py ata eva prabhāvitā. prajñāpāramitāyāḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1211_4: punar aparaṃ subhūte yo muhūrtaṃ vā divasaṃ vā divasaśataṃ vā saṃvatsaraṃ va saṃvatsaraśataṃ
S06adsp55-u:1211_5: vā. kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā yāvad asaṃkhyeyāny api kalpaśatāni imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1211_6: sarvākārajñatāraṃbaṇamanasikārair bhāvayiṣyati. sa prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati.
S06adsp55-u:1211_7: na tv eva ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tān sarvān dānena saṃtarpayet
S06adsp55-u:1211_8: śīle pratiṣṭhāpayet samādhau prajñāyāṃ vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane pratiṣṭhāpayet
S06adsp55-u:1211_9: srotaāpattiphale yāvad arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet pratyekabodhau (AdSPG I 132)
S06adsp55-u:1213: ato niryātā [f. 248b] hi te buddhā bhagavanto yair etad dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu prajñāptaṃ yāvad arhattvaṃ prajñaptaṃ pratyekabodhiḥ prajñaptā. yaḥ punar bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:1214_0: mahāsattvaḥ evam upadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñapāramitāyāṃ sthāsyati. sa khalu punar bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:1214_1: mahāsattvaḥ avaivartika pratikāṇkṣitavyaḥ. tathāgatasamanvāgata sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06adsp55-u:1214_3: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ avaropitakuśalamūlaḥ sa bodhisattvo
S06adsp55-u:1217: caturdaśaśūnyatābhāvitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ yāvat catuḥpratisaṃvidabhāvitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1221: buddhadarśana avirahitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1222: kuśalamūla avirahitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. buddhakṣetra avirahitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1228: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ akṣarapraveśakuśalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1229: anakṣarapraveśakuśalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ bodhisattvavihārakusalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1232: nekādhivacanakuśalo dvyadhivacanakuśalo bahvādhivacanakuśalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1233: stryadhivacanukuśalo puruṣādhivacanakuśalo napuṃsakādhivacanakuśalo sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1235: rūpakuśalo vedanākuśalaḥ saṃjñākuśalaḥ saṃskārakuśalaḥ vijñānakuśalaḥ yāvat nirvāṇakuśalo dharmadhātulakṣaṇakuśalaḥ saṃskṛtalaksaṇakuśalaḥ asaṃskṛtalakṣaṇakuśalaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1239_1: dhātukuśalaḥ adhātukuśalaḥ rūpamanasikārakuśalaḥ yāvat vijñānamanasikārakuśalaḥ yāvat
S06adsp55-u:1239_2: sarvākārajñatāmanasikārakuśalaḥ rūpaṃ rūpeṇa sūnyam iti kuśalaḥ yāvat vijñānaṃ vijñānena
S06adsp55-u:1239_3: śūnyam iti kuśalaḥ yāvad bodhi bodhyā śūnyeti kuśalaḥ praśrabdhimārgakuśalaḥ apraśrabdhimārgakuśalaḥ
S06adsp55-u:1239_5: arāgakuśalaḥ adveṣakuśalaḥ amohakuśalaḥ dṛṣṭikuśalaḥ adṛṣṭikuśalaḥ mithyādṛṣṭikuśalaḥ
S06adsp55-u:1239_6: amithyādṛṣṭikuśalaḥ yāvat sarvadṛṣṭikuśalaḥ nāmakuśalo nāmarūpakuśalaḥ āraṃbaṇakuśalaḥ
S06adsp55-u:1239_7: adhipatikuśalaḥ ākārakuśalaḥ lakṣaṇakuśalaḥ duḥkhakuśalaḥ samudayakuśalaḥ nirodhakuśalaḥ
S06adsp55-u:1239_8: mārgakuśalaḥ narakakuśalaḥ tiryagyonikuśalo yamalokakuśalaḥ manuṣyakuśalaḥ manuṣyamārgakuśalaḥ
S06adsp55-u:1241_0: arthakuśalo vyañjanakuśalaḥ yānatrayāvasthānakusalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1241_1: ete 'nuśāṃsāḥ subhūte tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ
S06adsp55-u:1241_2: prajñāpāramitām abhinirharataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyāḥ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1242: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā?
S06adsp55-u:1244_0: rūpaśāntatayā rūpavaśikatayā rūpatucchakatayā rūpāsārakatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:1244_2: asārakatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. yat punar subhūte evaṃ vadasi,
S06adsp55-u:1246: ākāśaśūnyatābhinirhareṇa prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā. yat punar evaṃ vadasi,
S06adsp55-u:1249: kiyac ciraṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cīrṇāṃ bhavati?
S06adsp55-u:1251: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. evam abhinirhartavyā bhāvayitavyā. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1253: bhagavān āha; anyeṣāṃ manasikārāṇām avakāśam adadatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1254_1: abhinirhartavyā prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā. tathā punaś caritavyaṃ tathā bhāvayitavyaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1254_2: tathā abhinirhartavyā yathā cittacaitasikā dharmā na pravartante. āha;
S06adsp55-u:1255: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitām abhinirharatā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā sarvākārajñatā anuprāpyate?
S06adsp55-u:1256: bhagavān āha: no hi iti. āha: tat kim (AdSPG I 136)
S06adsp55-u:1258: bhagavān āha: no hīti. āha: tat kiṃ bhāvayatā ca abhāvayatā ca?
S06adsp55-u:1259: bhagavān āha: no hīti. āha: tat kiṃ naiva bhāvayatā nā bhāvayatā?
S06adsp55-u:1260: bhagavān āha: no hīti. āha: katham idānīṃ bhagavaṃ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpyate?
S06adsp55-u:1261: bhagavān āha: yathā tathatā. āha: kathaṃ tathatā?
S06adsp55-u:1262: bhagavān āha: yathā bhūtakoṭi. āha: kathaṃ bhūtakoṭiḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1263: bhagavān āha: yathā dharmadhātuḥ. āha: kathaṃ dharmadhātuḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1265: yathā ātmadhātuḥ sattvadhātur jīvadhātuḥ pudgaladhātuḥ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1266: kathaṃ bhagavann ātmadhātuḥ sattvadhātur jīvadhātuḥ pudgaladhātu?
S06adsp55-u:1267: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nv ātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā pudgalo vā upalabhyate?
S06adsp55-u:1270: anupalabhamānaḥ subhūte ātmānaṃ vā sattvaṃ vā jivaṃ vā pudgalaṃ vā,
S06adsp55-u:1271: katham ātmadhātuṃ sattvadhātum jīvadhātuṃ pudgaladhātuṃ prajñapayiṣyāmaḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1272: evam aprajñapayan prajñāpāramitām evaṃ aprajñapayaṃ sarvadharmān sarvākārajñātam anuprāpsyati. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1273_0: kiṃ punar bhagavann aprajñapanīyā prajñāpāramitā. aprajñapanīyā dhyānapāramitā aprajñapanīyā
S06adsp55-u:1273_1: vīryapāramitā aprajñapanīyā kṣāntipāramitā aprajñapanīyā śīlapāramitā aprajñapanīyā dānapāramitā?
S06adsp55-u:1275: aprajñapanīyā subhūte prajñāpāramitā aprajñapanīyā yāvat sarvadharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā śrāvakadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1276_0: yadi bhagavann aprajñapanīyā sarvadharmā kutaḥ punar bhagavan narakāḥ prajñāyante.
S06adsp55-u:1276_1: tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā prajñāyate. devā vā manuṣyā vā prajñāyante śrotaāpanno
S06adsp55-u:1276_2: vā sakṛdāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā arhan vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā (AdSPG I 137)
S06adsp55-u:1278: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sattvaprajñaptir upalabhyate?
S06adsp55-u:1281_0: anupalabhamānaḥ subhūte sattvān kuto narakaṃ prajñapayiṣyāmi. tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1281_1: vā devān vā manuṣyan vā śrotaāpannaṃ vā sakṛdāgāminaṃ vā anāgāminaṃ vā arhattvaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1281_2: vā pratyekabuddhaṃ vā samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ vā prajñapayiṣyāmi?
S06adsp55-u:1282: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā aprajñapanīyeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyaṃ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1283_0: na punar bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpe śikṣitavyaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1283_1: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ [f. 250a] yāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne śikṣitavyaṃ yāvan na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1284: rūpe śikṣitavyaṃ anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā. vedanāyāṃ saṃjnāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā. yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1285: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ rūpe śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā. kathaṃ vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu kathaṃ vijñāne śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā?
S06adsp55-u:1287: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā?
S06adsp55-u:1292: saṃskārāṇāṃ na bhāvanāyāṃ na vibhāvanāyāṃ. āha: kathaṃ bhagavann anabhisaṃskāratāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ?
S06adsp55-u:1293: bhagavān āha; svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ sarvadharmāṃ paśyatā (AdSPG I 138)
S06adsp55-u:1297_0: rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ. vedanā vedanayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā. saṃjñā saṃjñayā
S06adsp55-u:1297_1: śūnyā draṣṭavyā saṃskārā saṃskarai śūnyā draṣṭavyā vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1297_2: cakṣuś caksūṣā śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ. yāvat mano manasā śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyam adhyātmaśūnyatā
S06adsp55-u:1297_3: adhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā yāvat svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatayā śūnyā
S06adsp55-u:1297_4: draṣṭavyā dhyānāni dhyānai śūnyāni draṣṭavyāni. yāvan nirodhasamāpattir nirodhasamāpattyā
S06adsp55-u:1297_5: śūnyā draṣṭavyā smṛtyūpasthānāni smṛtyupasthānai śūnyāni draṣṭavyāni yāvad bodhir
S06adsp55-u:1297_6: bodhyā śūnyā draṣṭavyā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1298: yadi bhagavaṃ rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ yāvad bodhir bodhyā śūnyā draṣṭavyā tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataś caryā bhavati?
S06adsp55-u:1300: acaryā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1303_0: tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate bodhisattvo 'pi nopalabhyate. caryā
S06adsp55-u:1303_1: api nopalabhyate. yaś carati yena vā carati yatra vā carati tad api nopalabhyate.
S06adsp55-u:1303_2: iyaṃ subhūte acaryā bodhisattvasya māhasattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā yatraite sarvaprapaṃcā nopalabhyante. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1304: yadi bhagavann acaryā prajñāpāramitācaryā tat katham ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ?
S06adsp55-u:1306: iha subhūte ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam evārabhya anupalaṃbheṣu sarvadharmeṣu śikṣitavyaṃ. tena dānaṃ dadatā anupalaṃbhayogena dānaṃ dātavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1308_0: rakṣitavyaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpādayatā anupalaṃbhayogena kṣāntyā saṃpādayitavyaṃ. vīryam
S06adsp55-u:1308_1: ārabhamāṇena anupalaṃbhayogena vīryam ārabdhavyaṃ. samādhiṃ samāpadyamānena anupalaṃbhayogena
S06adsp55-u:1308_2: samādhiḥ samāpattavyaḥ prajñāṃ bhāvayatā. anupalaṃbhayogena [f. 250b] prajñā bhāvayitavyā.
S06adsp55-u:1308_3: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ bhāvayatā anupalaṃbhayogena sarvākārajñatā bhāvayitavyā. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1309: kiyatā bhagavann anupalaṃbho bhavati. kiyatopalaṃbho bhavati?
S06adsp55-u:1310: bhagavan āha: yāvad dvayaṃ tāvad upalaṃbha. advayam anupalaṃbha. āha: kim iti bhagavan dvayaṃ?
S06adsp55-u:1312: yāvat cakṣūrūpāṇi yāvad yāvan manodharmāś ca yāvad yāvad bodhir buddhāś ca idaṃ subhūte dvayaṃ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1313: kiṃ punar bhagavann upalabhyo 'nupalaṃbhaḥ atha anupalabhyo 'nupalaṃbha?
S06adsp55-u:1315_0: na subhūte anupalaṃbhyo 'nupalaṃbha. na anupalabhyo 'nupalaṃbhaḥ. api tu khalu punaḥ
S06adsp55-u:1315_1: subhūte upalaṃbha anupalaṃbhasamatā anupalaṃbhaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena
S06adsp55-u:1315_2: mahāsattvena upalaṃbhasamatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ. evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattva
S06adsp55-u:1316: yadi bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran naivopalaṃbhe sajjate naivānupalaṃbhe,
S06adsp55-u:1317: kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bhūmer bhūmiḥ paripūrayitavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1320_0: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upalaṃbhe sthitvā bhūmer
S06adsp55-u:1320_1: bhūmiṃ paripūrayati. na hy upalaṃbhe sthitvā śakyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajnāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1320_2: caratā bhūmer bhūmi paripūrayituṃ. tat kasya heto?
S06adsp55-u:1321: anupalaṃbho hi prajñāpāramitā anupalaṃbho bodhi so 'pi nopalabhyate. yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (AdSPG I 140)
S06adsp55-u:1323_0: yadi bhagavaṃ prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate bodhir api nopalabhyate yo 'pi bodhau carati
S06adsp55-u:1323_1: so 'pi nopalabhyate. tat katham idānīṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1323_2: caratā sarvadharmeṣu pravicayaḥ kartavyaḥ idaṃ rūpam iyaṃ vedanā iyaṃ saṃjñā ime
S06adsp55-u:1323_3: saṃskārā idaṃ vijñānaṃ yāvad iyaṃ bodhiḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1325_0: na hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tathā dharmeṣu pravicayaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1325_1: karoti. yathā kurvan rūpam upalabheta vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānam upalabheta.
S06adsp55-u:1326: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ nopalabhate. vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ nopalabhate. yāvad bodhiṃ nopalabhate,
S06adsp55-u:1327_0: katham idānīṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrya śīlapāramitāṃ kṣantipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1327_1: dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrya bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāmati. bodhisattvanyāmam
S06adsp55-u:1327_2: avakramya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati. buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya sattvān paripācayati.
S06adsp55-u:1327_3: sattvān paripācya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ
S06adsp55-u:1327_4: pravartayati. dharmacakraṃ pravartya buddhakāryaṃ karoti. buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā sattvān
S06adsp55-u:1329_0: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpasya kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. na vedanāyā
S06adsp55-u:1329_1: na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ na vijñānasya kṛte yāvan na bodheḥ [f. 25la] kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1330: kasya bhagavan kṛte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ (AdSPG I 141)
S06adsp55-u:1331: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati? bhagavan āha: na kasyacit
S06adsp55-u:1332: kṛte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:1333: tathā hy akṛtāḥ sarvadharmāḥ anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1335: bodhir apy akṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā. bodhisattvo 'py akṛto 'nabhisaṃskṛtaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam akṛta anabhisaṃskṛtayogena. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1337: tat katham eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati. śrāvākayānasya vā pratyekabuddhayānasya vā mahāyānasya vā?
S06adsp55-u:1339: na subhūte akṛtānabhisaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kiṃcid vyavasthānam upalabhyate. abhisaṃskṛtānām abhisaṃcetayitānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānam upalabhyate. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:1340_0: tathā hi bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjano 'bhiniviśya pañcasu skandheṣu rūpe yāvad vijñāne.
S06adsp55-u:1340_1: yāvat sarvākārajñātāyām abhiniviśya rūpaṃ manyate rūpam upalabhate. yāvad vijñānaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1340_2: manyate vijñānam upalabhate. yāvad bodhiṃ manyate bodhim upalabhate. tasyaivaṃ bhavaty:
S06adsp55-u:1341: ahaṃ bodhim abhisaṃbhotsye ahaṃ sattvān mocayiṣye saṃsārāt sa evam asat kalpayati. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:1342: tathā hi subhūte yad buddhaiḥ paṃcabhiś cakṣubhir nopalabdhaṃ rūpaṃ yāvad bodhiḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1343: tat te mohapuruṣā andhā acakṣuṣkā sattvāṃc chinnanti saṃsārāt parimocayituṃ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1344: yadi bhagavaṃs tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena paṃcabhiś cakṣubhir nopalabhdāḥ sattvā ye saṃsārāt parimucyeran,
S06adsp55-u:1345: katham idānīṃ bhagavān anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvāṃs tṛṣu rāśiṣu vyākarṣīt,
S06adsp55-u:1348: na me subhūte anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya kaścit sattva upalabdhaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1349: samyaktvaniyato vā aniyato vā mithyātvaniyato vā. api tu khalu subhūte ya ime sattvā adravye dravyasaṃjñina. abhūtagrāhād vārayāmi,
S06adsp55-u:1351: nanu bhagavatā paramārthe sthitvā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā?
S06adsp55-u:1352: bhagavān āha: neti. āha: tad viparyāse sthitvā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā?
S06adsp55-u:1355_0: tad yadi bhagavan nāpi paramārthe sthitvā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā
S06adsp55-u:1355_1: nāpi viparyāse sthitvā tan mā haiva na tathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā
S06adsp55-u:1356: abhisaṃbuddhā subhūte tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1357_0: sā na kvacit sthitvā saṃskṛte vā dhātāv asaṃskṛte vā dhātau. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte
S06adsp55-u:1357_1: tathāgatanirmito na kvacit sthitaḥ saṃskṛte vā dhātau vā asaṃskṛte vā dhātau. sa
S06adsp55-u:1359: sa dānapāramitāyāṃ carec chīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caret,
S06adsp55-u:1360_0: yāvac catvāri dhyānāny upasaṃpadya viharet catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattī.
S06adsp55-u:1360_1: pañcābhijñā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayed yāvad āryāṣṭāṃgaṃ [f. 251b] mārgaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1360_2: śūnyatāṃ samādhim ānimittaṃ samādhim apraṇihitaṃ samādhim adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvat
S06adsp55-u:1360_3: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām aṣṭau vimokṣān navānupūrvasamāpattīr daśatathāgatabalāni catvān
S06adsp55-u:1360_4: vaiśāradyāni catasra pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇām (AdSPG I 143)
S06adsp55-u:1361: aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān dharmacakrapravartanāyai. sa ca nirmitaḥ apy apramāṇān sattvān nirmāya triṣu rāśiṣu vyākuryāt,
S06adsp55-u:1362: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte. api nu tena nirmitena kaścit sattvo vyākṛto bhavet?
S06adsp55-u:1365_0: evam eva subhūte tathāgatena nirmitopamā sarvadharmā jñātā gaṇitā ajñānanirmitāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1365_1: jñātvā na kaścit sattva upalabdho nāpi vinītaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena
S06adsp55-u:1365_2: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgatanirmita. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1367: tathāgatasya ca nirmitasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ ko 'bhiprāyaḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1369: tathāgatasya subhūte nirmitasya ca na kiṃcid viśeṣo na kiṃcin nānākaraṇam upalabhyate. nirviśeṣo hi subhūte tathāgataś ca nirmitaś ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1370: tathā hi yat tathāgataḥ karma karoti. taṃ nirmitaḥ karma karoti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1371: kiṃ punar bhagavan sati tathāgate nirmitaḥ karma karoti?
S06adsp55-u:1372: bhagavān āha; karoti subhūte. āha: atha kathaṃ punar bhagavann asati tathāgate nirmita karma karoti?
S06adsp55-u:1374: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte śāntamatis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvam anupalabhamānas tathāgatavigrahaṃ nirmāya parinirvṛta,
S06adsp55-u:1375: tena ca nirmitenordhvaṃ kalpaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1376: sa ca paścād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ vyākṛtya parinirvṛta iti saṃjñātaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1377_0: na ca nirmitasya kaścid utpādo na parinirvāṇaṃ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena
S06adsp55-u:1377_1: mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ yaduta nirmitopamān sarvadharmān adhimucya.
S06adsp55-u:1378: nirmitasya ca tathāgatasya ca viśeṣo nāsti,
S06adsp55-u:1379_0: dakṣiṇāpariśuddhiḥ kathaṃ bhaviṣyati. ya ime bhagavaṃ sattvā puṇyārthikā nirvānārthikās
S06adsp55-u:1379_1: tathāgate 'rhe samyaksaṃbuddhe dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti. na ca jātu sā kṣīyate yāvan
S06adsp55-u:1379_2: na te sarve 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtā bhavanti. evam eva nirmite dakṣiṇā
S06adsp55-u:1379_3: pratiṣṭhāpitā. na jātu kṣīyate yāvan na te sarve 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtā bhavanti?
S06adsp55-u:1381_0: yayā subhūte dharmatayā tathāgata sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyaḥ tathaiva
S06adsp55-u:1381_1: dharmatayā nirmitaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyaḥ. tiṣṭhatu tāvat subhūte
S06adsp55-u:1381_2: tathāgatapratiṣṭhāpitā dakṣiṇā. tiṣṭhatu tathāgatanirmitapratiṣṭhāpitā dakṣiṇā. ye
S06adsp55-u:1381_3: 'pi kecit subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tathā tathāgataṃ maitrāvatā manasikāreṇa manasikariṣyanti,
S06adsp55-u:1382: sarve te tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam adhigamya duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyanti. tiṣṭhatu maitrāvān manasikāraḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1383: ye pi kecit subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā ākāśe puṣpaṃ kṣepsyanti tathāgataṃ manasikṛtya,
S06adsp55-u:1384: sarve te tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam anadhigamya,
S06adsp55-u:1385: duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyanti. tiṣṭhatu subhūte maitrāvān manasikāraḥ tiṣṭhatv ākāśe puṣpaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1386: ye kecit subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā buddhaṃ namaskariṣyanti,
S06adsp55-u:1387: sarve te [f. 252a] 'nupūrveṇa duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyanti. evaṃ mahārthikā vata subhūte tathāgatapratiṣṭhāpitā dakṣiṇā. evaṃ mahānuśaṃsā. tad anena paryāyeṇa subhūte veditavyaṃ. ,
S06adsp55-u:1388: tathāgatasya ca nirmitasya ca nāsti kiṃcin nānākaraṇaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1390: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1391: dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāyām avatīrya. sā ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā na vikopayitavyā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā dharmateti na vikopayitavyaṃ. iyan dhyāna pāramitā,
S06adsp55-u:1392: iyaṃ dhyānapāramitāyā dharmateti na vikopayitavyaṃ. yāvat iyan dānapāramitā iyan dānapāramitāyā dharmateti na vikopayitavyaṃ. evaṃ yāvat sarvadharmeṣu kartavyaṃ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1393: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā na vikopayitavyā,
S06adsp55-u:1394: tad yat punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatena vikopitam idaṃ rūpam yāvad idaṃ vijñānaṃ. evam adhyātmikā bāhyā dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1395: evaṃ kuśalā akuśalāḥ sāsravā anāsravāḥ laukikā lokottarāḥ sādhāraṇā asādhāraṇāḥ saṃskṛta asaṃskṛtā dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1396: tan mā haiva bhagavatā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā vikopitā bhavati?
S06adsp55-u:1397: bhagavān āha: no hīdaṃ subhūte. nāmanimittaiś ca mayā te dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ dharmāṇāṃ sūcanā kṛtā,
S06adsp55-u:1398: kathaṃ paro 'vataret iti. na punar dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā vikopitā bhavati. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1399: yadi bhagavaṃ nāmani mittaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ pareṣām avataraṇārthaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1400: tat kathaṃ bhagavann anāmakā animittā dharmā nāmanimittena vyāhṛtāḥ bhagavān āha:
S06adsp55-u:1401: vyāhāraḥ subhūte na nāmanimittaṃ na abhiniveśo vā,
S06adsp55-u:1402: nānyatra subhūte duḥkham eva vyāharāmi na nāmni na nimitte vā abhiniveśe. na hi subhūte tathāgato vā tathāgataśrāvako vā nāmanimitte (AdSPG I 146)

S06adsp55-u:1620_2: sa khalu punar subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ (AdSPG I 165)
S06adsp55-u:1622: sa tan dānan dadan na kalpayati,
S06adsp55-u:1623: na nimittīkaroti naiva bhāvato na abhāvato manasikaroti. pratigrāhakam api na kalpayati,
S06adsp55-u:1625: naiva bhāvato nābhāvato manasikaroti. dāyakam api na kalpayati. na nimittīkaroti. naiva bhāvato nābhavato manasikaroti. tad api bodhicittaṃ nopalabhate. na nimittīkaroti,
S06adsp55-u:1626: nālambanīkaroti. na samanupaśyati ... yāvat ... prajñāpāramitāṃ na kalpayati,
S06adsp55-u:1628: naiva bhāvato na abhāvato manasikaroti. yo 'pi tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06adsp55-u:1629: tam api na samanupaśyati na nimittīkaroti,
S06adsp55-u:1631: yeṣām api sattvānāṃ kṛtaśas tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati tāṃ na kalpayati na nimittīkaroti,
S06adsp55-u:1632: naiva bhāvato nābhāvato manasikaroti. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:1633: tathā hi yadi ta eva sarvadharmā abhāvās te na buddhaiḥ kṛtā na śrāvakair na pratyekabuddhaiḥ kṛtā. akārakāḥ hi sarvadharmā kārakavirahitāḥ āha:
S06adsp55-u:1634: nanu bhagavaṃ dharmair eva dharmā virahitā?
S06adsp55-u:1636: evam etat subhūte evam etat. dharmair eva dharmā virahitā. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1637: yadi bhagavaṃ dharmair eva dharmā virahitās,
S06adsp55-u:1638: tat kathaṃ virahito dharmo virahitaṃ dharmaṃ saṃjānāti,
S06adsp55-u:1639_0: bhāva iti vā abhāva iti vā. na hi bhagavann abhāvo dharmo abhāvam dharmaṃ jānāti.
S06adsp55-u:1639_1: na bhāvo dharmo 'bhāvaṃ dharmaṃ jānāti. na abhāvo dharmo 'bhāvan dharmaṃ jānāti.
S06adsp55-u:1639_2: na bhāvo dharmo bhāvaṃ dharmaṃ jānāti. evam asaṃjānaṃ sarvadharmeṣu kutaḥ evaṃ bhavati.
S06adsp55-u:1639_3: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāva iti vā abhāva iti vā?
S06adsp55-u:1640: bhagavān āha: lokasaṃvṛtim upādāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (AdSPG I 166)
S06adsp55-u:1641: caran bhāva iti vā abhāva iti vā nirdiśati,
S06adsp55-u:1642: na punaḥ paramārthena. āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann anyā lokasaṃvṛtir anyaḥ paramārthaḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1644: na anya subhūte Iokasaṃvṛtir anyaḥ paramārthaḥ. yena lokasaṃvṛtes tathatā saiva paramārthasya [f. 257a] tathatā,
S06adsp55-u:1645: tat te sattvā viparyastā etāṃ tathatāṃ na jānanti na paśyanti. teṣām arthāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo lokasaṃvṛtyā nirdiśati,
S06adsp55-u:1646: bhāva iti vā abhāva iti vā. api tu khalu subhūte ya ete sattvāḥ pañcaskandheṣu bhāvasaṃjñinaḥ abhāva iti na jānanti. teṣām arthāyaivaṃ taṃ nirdiśyate,
S06adsp55-u:1648: katham abhāva jānīyur iti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. ((64))
S06adsp55-u:1651: athāyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: bodhisattva cārikā bodhisattvacārikety ucyate,
S06adsp55-u:1654: bodhisattvacārikā bodhisattvacāriketi subhūte ucyate bodhaye esā cārikā tasmād bodhisattvacārikety ucyate. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1655: kva bhagavaṃ sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cārikā?
S06adsp55-u:1657_0: rūpaṃ śūnyam iti carati. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaṃ śūnyam iti carati. evam ādhyātmikabāhyair
S06adsp55-u:1657_1: āyatanair dānapāramitāyāṃ carati śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1657_5: prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ carati svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ carati. anupalaṃbhaśūnyatāyām
S06adsp55-u:1657_6: abhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ carati. svabhāvaśūnyatāyāna carati. abhāvasvabhāśūnyatāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp55-u:1657_7: prathame dhyāne carati. dvitīye tṛtīye eaturthe dhyāne carati maitryāṃ carati. karuṇāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1657_8: muditāyām upekṣāyāṃ carati. ākāśānantyāyatane carati. vijñānantyāyatane ākiṃcanyāyatane,
S06adsp55-u:1659_0: saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatane carati. caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu carati. caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu
S06adsp55-u:1659_1: caturṣu ṛddhipādeṣu paṃcasv indriyeṣu. paṃcasu baleṣu. saptabodhyaṅgeṣv. āryāṣṭāṃge
S06adsp55-u:1659_2: mārge carati. śūnyatāyāṃ samādhau caraty ānimitte samādhau ca apraṇihite samādhau
S06adsp55-u:1659_3: carati. aṣṭasu vimokṣeṣu navasv anupūrvasamāpattiṣu carati. daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu
S06adsp55-u:1659_4: carati. catasṛṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇāyām aṣṭādaśasv
S06adsp55-u:1659_5: āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu carati. buddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye carati. sattvaparipāke
S06adsp55-u:1659_6: carati. pratibhāne caraty akṣarābhinirhāreṣu carati. akṣarapraveśeṣu carati. anakṣarapraveśe
S06adsp55-u:1659_7: carati. dhāranīṣu carati. saṃskṛtadhātau caraty. asaṃskṛtadhātau carati. tathā punar
S06adsp55-u:1659_8: carati yathā buddhir na dvidhī bhavati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06adsp55-u:1659_9: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhau carati. athāyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:1660: buddho buddha iti bhagavamn ucyate. kasyaitad adhivacanaṃ buddha iti?
S06adsp55-u:1661: bhagavān āha: bhūto 'rtho buddha ity ucyate. api tu khalu subhūte bhūto 'nena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddhas,
S06adsp55-u:1662: tasmād buddha ity ucyate. bhūto [f. 257b] 'nenārthaḥ pratividdhas tasmād buddha ity ucyate. api tu khalu subhūte sarvadharmāḥ anena yathāvad abhisaṃbuddhās,
S06adsp55-u:1663: tasmād buddha ity ucyate. āha: bodhi bodhir iti bhagavann ucyate,
S06adsp55-u:1665: bhagavān āha: bodhir iti subhūte śūnyatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1668: dharmadhātor etad adhivacanaṃ. api tu khalu subhūte bodhir iti tathata avitathatā (AdSPG I 169)
S06adsp55-u:1670: tasmād bodhir ity ucyate. api tu khalu subhūte nāmadheyanimittamātram etad yaduta bodhis,
S06adsp55-u:1671: tasmād bodhir ity ucyate. api tu khalu subhūte abhedārtho bodhyarthaḥ. api tu khalu subhūte buddhānām eṣā bhagavatāṃ bodhis,
S06adsp55-u:1672: tasmād bodhir ity ucyate. api tu khalu subhūte buddhair eṣā bhagavadbhir abhisaṃbuddhās,
S06adsp55-u:1673: tasmād bodhir ity ucyate. āha: yo bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha bodhaye carati,
S06adsp55-u:1674: sa kiṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir carati yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ viharati,
S06adsp55-u:1675: katameṣāṃ bhagavaṃ kuśalamūlānām ācayo bhavaty apacayo vā hānir vā vṛddhir vā utpādo vā nirodho vā saṃkleśo vā vyavadānaṃ vā?
S06adsp55-u:1677_0: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ iha bodhau carati ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir carati
S06adsp55-u:1677_1: yāvat sarvākārajñatayā carati. tasya na kasyacid dharmasya ācayo bhavaty apacayo
S06adsp55-u:1677_2: vā hānir vā vṛddhir vā utpādo vā nirodho vā saṃkleśaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā. tat kasya heto?
S06adsp55-u:1678: na hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kasyacid dharmasya āraṃbaṇayogena pratyupasthitā,
S06adsp55-u:1679: ācaye vā apacaye vā hānaye vā vṛddhaye vā utpādāya vā nirodhāya vā saṃkleśāya vā vyavadānāya vā. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1680: yadi bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ bodhir na kasyacid dharmasya āraṃbaṇayogena pratyupasthitā. tat katham idānīṃ
S06adsp55-u:1681: bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti. śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06adsp55-u:1682: katham adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ carati. bahirddhāśūnyatāyām adhyātmabahirddhāśūnyatāyāṃ yāvat svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ (AdSPG I 170)
S06adsp55-u:1684_0: kathaṃ dhyāneṣu apramaṇeṣu ārūpyasamāpattiṣu yāvat anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu carati.
S06adsp55-u:1684_1: kathaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu vimokṣamukheṣu carati. kathaṃ daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu
S06adsp55-u:1684_2: carati caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu aṣṭādaśaṣv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu
S06adsp55-u:1684_3: mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ carati. kathaṃ daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu carati. śrāvakapratyekabbuddhabhūmim
S06adsp55-u:1686: na hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dvayacāriṇī buddhiḥ. na hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvayena dānapāramitāyāṃ carati. na dvayena śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06adsp55-u:1688_0: na dvayena vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati. na dvayena samādhipāramitāyāṃ carati. na dvayena
S06adsp55-u:1688_1: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti
S06adsp55-u:1688_2: yāvat prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1689: yadi bhagavaṃ na dvayena [f. 258a] dānapāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06adsp55-u:1690: na dvayena śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06adsp55-u:1691: tat katham idānīṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kuśalamūlair vivardhamānai prathamacittotpādam upādāya. yāvat paścimakaś cittotpādaḥ kuśalamūlair vivardhate?
S06adsp55-u:1692: bhagavān āha: ye subhūte dvayena caranti, na te vivardhante kuśalamūlaiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1694: te na vivardhaṃte kuśalamūlaiḥ. bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punar advayena carati,
S06adsp55-u:1695: sa prathamacittotpādam upādāya kuśalamūlair vivardhate. yāvat paścimakaś cittotpāda kuśalamūlair vivardhate. tena (AdSPG I 171)
S06adsp55-u:1697: yair akuśalamūlair avamarditaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patet,
S06adsp55-u:1698: tad anyair vā akuśalair dharmaiḥ saṃhṛyeta,
S06adsp55-u:1699: yaiḥ saṃhṛyamāno dānapāramitāyāṃ caran kuśalair mūlair na vivardheta,
S06adsp55-u:1700: yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran kuśalamūlair na vivardheta. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1701: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kusalamūlānāṃ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ?
S06adsp55-u:1703: na bodhisattvo mahāsattvo kuśalamūlānāṃ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06adsp55-u:1706: na aparipūrya kuśalamūlāni. na kalyāṇamitrair aparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śaktaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāptuṃ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1707: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ paryupāsya buddhāṃ bhagavataḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ parigṛhītaḥ kalyāṇamitrair parigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti?
S06adsp55-u:1709: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāste,
S06adsp55-u:1710: yac ca te buddhā bhagavanto bhāṣante,
S06adsp55-u:1711_1: tat sarvam udgṛhṇāty udgṛhya vācā suparicitaṃ kṛtvā manasā ca anuprekṣitaṃ kṛtvā
S06adsp55-u:1711_2: dṛṣṭyā supratividdhaṃ kṛtvā dhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate. dhāraṇyāpratilabdhayā pratisaṃvida
S06adsp55-u:1712: tasya jātivyativṛttasyāpi te dharmā na jātu vipraṇaśyati yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. tatra ca tathāgateṣv arhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu kuśalamūlāny avaropayati,
S06adsp55-u:1713: yaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ parigṛhīto na jātv apāyeṣv akṣaṇeṣu copapadyate. taiś ca kuśalaiḥ mūlaiḥ āśrayapariśuddhiṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06adsp55-u:1714: yair āśrayair buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06adsp55-u:1715: taiś ca kuśalamūlaiḥ parigṛhītaḥ kalyāṇamitrair na jātu virahito
S06adsp55-u:1716_0: bhavati buddhaiś ca bhagavadbhiḥ bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ śrāvakaiś ca ye buddhayānasya
S06adsp55-u:1716_1: varṇāṃ bhāṣante. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp55-u:1717: kuśalamūlāni ca avaropayitavyāni kalyāṇamitrāṇi ca sevitavyāni. ((65)) [f. 258b]
S06adsp55-u:1721: yaḥ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo naiva buddhāṃ bhagavataḥ paryupāste,
S06adsp55-u:1724: mā haiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt?
S06adsp55-u:1726: nāsti subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo buddhāṃ bhagavato 'paryupāsya kuśalamūlāny aparipūrya kalyāṇamitrair aparigṛhītaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt. tat kasya hetor?
S06adsp55-u:1727_0: buddhān eva tāvat paryupāsya kuśalamūlāny avaropya kalyāṇamitrāṇi. sevitvā ādy api
S06adsp55-u:1727_1: tāvat sarvākārajñatā na śakyate 'nuprāptuṃ. prāg eva aparyupāsya buddhān bhagavataḥ
S06adsp55-u:1727_2: aparipūrya kuśalamūlāny asevitvā kalyāṇamitrāṇi sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyād iti
S06adsp55-u:1727_3: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena satye bodhiṃ niṣṭhātukāmena,
S06adsp55-u:1728: kṣipraṃ ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena buddhān bnagavataḥ paryupāsitavyā kuśalamūlāny avaropayitavyāni kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1729: kena kāraṇena bhagavaṃ bodisattvo mahāsattvo buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsya kuśalamūlāny avaropya kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitvā sarvākārajñatāṃ na anuprāpnoti?
S06adsp55-u:1731: so 'nenopāyo na śruto bhavati teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikāt,
S06adsp55-u:1732: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na avaropitāni. (AdSPG I 174)
S06adsp55-u:1733: tāni ca kalyāṇamitrāṇi na sevitāni. ye 'syopāyam upadiśanti. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1734: katamad bhagavāṃs tad upāyakauśalaṃ yenopāyakauśalena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti?
S06adsp55-u:1736: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ caraṃ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dānaṃ dadāti,
S06adsp55-u:1737_0: buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyas pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ śrāvakebhyo manuṣyabhūtebhyaḥ amanuṣyabhūtebhyaḥ.
S06adsp55-u:1737_1: sa taiḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair samanvāgato na ca asya dāne dānasaṃjñā bhavati,
S06adsp55-u:1739: na dāyake dāyakasaṃjñā bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1740_0: tathā hi subhūte svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān jānāty asato 'saṃbhūtān apariniṣpannān
S06adsp55-u:1740_1: anabhinirvṛttān sarvadharmān paśyati. dharmāṇāṃ ca dharmalakṣaṇam avataraty akiñcitsamarthāḥ
S06adsp55-u:1740_2: sarvadharmā ity asaṃskāralakṣaṇena avatarati. so 'nenopāyakauśalena samanvāgata kuśalamūlair vivardhate,
S06adsp55-u:1742_0: dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati. na
S06adsp55-u:1742_1: ca dānaphalam āśaṃsate yad dānaphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuṃjīta anyatra sattvaparitrāṇatāyai
S06adsp55-u:1745_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caraṃ prathamacittotpādam
S06adsp55-u:1745_1: upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ śīlaṃ rakṣati. tasya naiva rāga
S06adsp55-u:1745_2: cittam āvṛnoti na doṣo na moho na anuśayā na paryutthānāni na anye 'py akuśalā dharmā
S06adsp55-u:1746_0: tadyathā mātsaryaṃ vā dauśīlyaṃ vā kṣobhaṇacittaṃ vā kausīdyacittaṃ vā hīna [f. 259a]
S06adsp55-u:1746_1: vīryacittaṃ vā vibhrāntacittaṃ vā dauṣprajñacittaṃ vā māno vā avamāno vā adhimāno

S06adsp55-u:1904: na subhūte prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vilakṣaṇā naivalakṣaṇā. alakṣaṇabhāvanā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1913: kathaṃ punar bhagavaṃ rūpavibhāvanābhāvanā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yāvat kathaṃ sarvavāsanānusandhiprahānavibhāvanābhāvanā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā?
S06adsp55-u:1915: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati yāvad vijñānaṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati. yāvat sarvākarajñatāṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati yāvat
S06adsp55-u:1916: sarvavāsanānusandhiprahāṇaṃ [f. 264a] bhāva iti na bhāvayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp55-u:1918: nāsti śilapāramitābhāvanā kṣāntipāramitābhāvanā vīryapāramitābhāvanā dhyānapāramitābhāvanā nāsti subhūte bhāvasaṃjñinaḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvana. (AdSPG I 195)
S06adsp55-u:1919: nāsti bhāvasaṃjñinaḥ yāvat sarvākārajñatābhāvanā. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:1920_0: tathā hi subhūte tasja bhāve saktasya dānena śīlena kṣāntyā vīryeṇa dhyānena prajñāyām
S06adsp55-u:1920_1: eṣa saṃgaḥ. yas tathā saktas tasya nāsti mokṣaḥ. nāsti subhūte bhāvasaṃjñinaḥ smṛtyupasthānabhāvanā,
S06adsp55-u:1922: na bodhyaṅgabhāvanā na mārgabhāvanā na śūnyatābhāvanā na animittabhāvanā na apraṇihitabhāvanā,
S06adsp55-u:1923: yāvan nāsti sarvākārajñatābhāvanā. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp55-u:1924: tathā hi subhūte sa bhāve saktaḥ. evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:1927: bhagavān āha: dvayaṃ subhūte bhāvaḥ, advayam abhāvaḥ. āha: kim iti bhagavan dvayaṃ?
S06adsp55-u:1931_0: rūpasaṃjñā yāvad dharmasaṃjñā yāvad buddhasaṃjñā bodhisaṃjñā saṃskṛtadhātusaṃjñā
S06adsp55-u:1931_1: asaṃskṛtadhātusaṃjñā yāvat subhūte sarvasaṃjñā yāvac ca asaṃjñā sarvam etad dvayaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:1933: yāvat saṃskāras tāvat sattvā na parimucyante jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ (AdSPG I 196)
S06adsp55-u:1934: tad anena api subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam:
S06adsp55-u:1935: nāsti dvayasaṃjñino dānaṃ nāsti śīlaṃ nāsti kṣāntir nāsti vīryaṃ nāsti dhyānaṃ nāsti prajñā,
S06adsp55-u:1936: nāsti mārgo nāsti prāptir nāsty abhisamayo,
S06adsp55-u:1938: kutaḥ punar rūpasya parijñā yāvad vijñānasya parijñā,
S06adsp55-u:1941: kutas tasya srotaāpattiphalaṃ kuto yāvad arhatvaṃ kutaḥ pratyekabodhiḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1946: yadi bhagavan bhāvasaṃjñinaḥ anulomiky api kṣāntir nāsti,
S06adsp55-u:1948: kiṃ punar abhāvasaṃjñinaḥ anulomikī kṣāntiḥ nāsti,
S06adsp55-u:1949_0: śuklavidarśanabhūmir vā gotrabhūmir vā aṣṭamakabhūmir vā darśanabhūmir vā tanubhūmir
S06adsp55-u:1949_1: vā vītarāgabhūmir vā kṛtāvībhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā bodhisattvabhūmir vā
S06adsp55-u:1949_2: buddhabhūmir vā. mārgabhāvanā vā yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya kleśān na prajahāti śrāvakapratisaṃyuktān
S06adsp55-u:1950: yaiḥ kleśair āvṛto bodhisattvanyāmaṃ na avakrāmet,
S06adsp55-u:1952: sarvākārajñatāṃ na anuprāpnuvan sarvavāsanānusandhikleśān na prajahīta?
S06adsp55-u:1953: yadi bhagavan nāsti kasyacid dharmasya utpadyamānasya utpādaḥ na ca anutpādya imān dharmāṃc chakyaṃ sarvākārajñatāṃ anuprāptuṃ?
S06adsp55-u:1955: evam etat subhūte evam etat. na abhāvasaṃjñina ānulomikī kṣāntir asti yāvan nāsti sarvavāsanānusandhikleśaprahānaṃ. āha:
S06adsp55-u:1956: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bhāvasaṃjñā bhavaty abhāvasaṃjñā vā,
S06adsp55-u:1982_0: no hīdaṃ subhūte. na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kvacid
S06adsp55-u:1982_1: dharme bhāvasaṃjñī vā abhāvasaṃjñī vā bhavati. eṣaiva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06adsp55-u:1982_2: ānulomikī kṣāntir yatra nāsti bhāvasaṃjñā na abhāvasaṃjñā. eṣaivāsya mārgabhāvanā
S06adsp55-u:1982_3: yatra nāsti bhāvasaṃjñā na abhāvasaṃjñā. etad eva asya phalaṃ yatra nāsti bhāvasaṃjñā
S06adsp55-u:1982_4: na abhāvasaṃjñā. abhāvaḥ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgaḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1983: abhāva eva abhisamayas. tad anena api te subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam:
S06adsp55-u:1986: tat kathaṃ bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās tathāgatena abhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06adsp55-u:1989: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06adsp55-u:1990: iha ahaṃ subhūte pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caraṃ,
S06adsp55-u:1992_0: viviktam eva kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalaiḥ dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ
S06adsp55-u:1992_1: prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvad caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharāmi. so 'haṃ
S06adsp55-u:1992_2: teṣān dhyānānāṃ dhyānāṅgānāñ ca nimittam anudgṛhṇaṃs,
S06adsp55-u:1995: dhyānāni nopalabhe. so 'haṃ tāni dhyānāny ākāraviśuddhāni samāpadye,
S06adsp55-u:1996: so 'haṃ tāni dhyānāni vipākīkṛtvā vividhajñānasākṣātkriyāyai cittam abhinirṇāmayāmi,
S06adsp55-u:1997_1: divyacakṣurjñānasākṣātkriyāyai cittam abhinirṇāmayāmi. tāsāṃ sākṣātkriyāyāṃ nimittam
S06adsp55-u:1997_2: anudgṛhṇaṃs tābhir abhijñabhir na manye na āsvādayāmi nopalabhe. so 'haṃ tāḥ pañcābhijñāḥ
S06adsp55-u:1997_3: ākāśasamāḥ paśyāmi samāpadye. so 'haṃ subhūte ekalakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā anuttarāṃ
S06adsp55-u:2001_0: so 'haṃ daśabhiḥ tathāgatabalaiḥ samanvāgataś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ
S06adsp55-u:2001_1: mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā 'ṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sattvāṃs
S06adsp55-u:2003: kathaṃ bhagavaṃs [f. 265a] tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena abhāvasvabhāvāni catvāri dhyānāni utpāditāni,
S06adsp55-u:2007: sacet subhūte kāmānāṃ vā pāpakānāṃ vā akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo 'bhaviṣyad bhāvo vābhaviṣyat para bhāvo vābhaviṣyan,
S06adsp55-u:2008_0: na ahaṃ subhūte pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ carann abhāvasvabhāvān kāmān viditvā abhāvasvabhāvān
S06adsp55-u:2008_1: pāpakān akuśalān dharmān viditvā catvāri dhyānāny upasaṃpadya vyāharṣaṃ. yasmāt tarhi
S06adsp55-u:2008_2: subhūte na kāmānāṃ pāpakānāṃ ca akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo 'sti na bhāvo na parabhāvaḥ
S06adsp55-u:2009_0: tasmād ahaṃ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caran viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair
S06adsp55-u:2009_1: dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamadhyānam upasaṃpadya vyāharṣaṃ.
S06adsp55-u:2009_2: evaṃ yāvat caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya vyāharṣaṃ. sacet subhūte abhijñānāṃ bhāvo
S06adsp55-u:2009_3: vā svabhāvo vā parabhāvo vā abhaviṣyan,
S06adsp55-u:2010: na ahaṃ subhūte sarvābhijñā abhāvasvabhāvā viditvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye. yasmāt tarhi subhūte sarvābhijñānāṃ na bhāvo na svabhāvo na parabhāvo 'sti,
S06adsp55-u:2012: tasmāt tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvābhijñā abhāvasvabhāvā viditvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ.
